Mandarin.question: How do you say 'I am a student'?
Choose the correct way to say 'She eats an apple' in Mandarin:
What is the correct question word for 'where'?
How do you express 'I love you'?
Select the correct sentence structure for 'Yesterday, I went to the park.'
options: 我昨天去了公园 (wǒ zuótiān qùle gōngyuán)
昨天我去公园了 (zuótiān wǒ qù gōngyuánle)
公园我昨天去了 (gōngyuán wǒ zuótiān qùle)
我去公园昨天了 (wǒ qù gōngyuán zuótiānle)
Mandarin.answer: 昨天我去公园了 (zuótiān wǒ qù gōngyuánle)

Mandarin.question: Choose the option that correctly matches the phrase 'to make a phone call':
Which phrase means 'Excuse me, where is the subway?'
options: 请问，地铁在哪里？(qǐngwèn, dìtiě zài nǎlǐ?)
请问，你好吗？(qǐngwèn, nǐ hǎo ma?)
请问，你是哪国人？(qǐngwèn, nǐ shì nǎ guó rén?)
请问，你叫什么名字？(qǐngwèn, nǐ jiào shénme míngzì?)
Mandarin.answer: 请问，地铁在哪里？(qǐngwèn, dìtiě zài nǎlǐ?)

Mandarin.question: How do you say 'My birthday is in October'?
options: 我的生日在十月 (wǒ de shēngrì zài shí yuè)
我的生日是十月 (wǒ de shēngrì shì shí yuè)
我在十月有生日 (wǒ zài shí yuè yǒu shēngrì)
十月是我的生日 (shí yuè shì wǒ de shēngrì)
Mandarin.answer: 我的生日在十月 (wǒ de shēngrì zài shí yuè)
